summary: Provides a BidsDataset class that parses BIDS‑compliant neuroimaging collections, extracts and organizes contrast, ROI, and subject metadata, integrates with the MRI2DSegmentationDataset pipeline, applies optional preprocessing/augmentation (e.g., film), and supplies an iterable interface with progress tracking for downstream deep‑learning workflows.
business_intent: Simplify and standardize the loading, preprocessing, and management of BIDS datasets for researchers and developers building and evaluating deep‑learning models on medical imaging data, ensuring consistent handling of metadata, segmentation masks, and optional object‑detection utilities.
